Latvian Academy of Sciences

Academy of Sciences observation tower. 65 meters high The viewing area of ​​the Latvian Academy of Sciences is a breathtaking and exciting view of Riga from above. You can see the Old Town very well, Central market church towers and bridges. It is good luck, if you have good weather! The building of the Latvian Academy of Sciences is unique - a building that has caught my attention from an early age, when we went to Riga. Its architecture has always resembled someone castle. The high-rise building of the Academy of Sciences is 21 stories high. It is considered the first high-rise building in Latvia. This high-rise buildings design and also construction lasted almost 10 years and it was completed in 1961.
